name: @acegoal07/file-tools
description: A package of easy to use tools for interacting with files using javascript

scripts.build: npx -p typescript tsc src/index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir types && cls && npx tsc && cls && xcopy /s/y src dist && xcopy /y package.json dist && xcopy /y readme.md dist && xcopy /y lICENSE dist
scripts.build+publish: npm run build && cls && cd dist && cls && npm publish && npm run cleanOldBuilds
scripts.runTests: npm i && cls && node tests/fileTools.js && node tests/directoryTools.js && npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.build+test: npm run build && cls && npm run runTests
scripts.cleanOldBuilds: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf types

author: acegoal07
